import "./beerItem.css"; export default function BeerItem({ id, name, tagline, first_brewed, description, brewers_tips, image_url, }) { return (

{name} | {id}

{tagline}

{name} | {id}

{tagline}

First Brewed

{first_brewed}

Description

{description}

Brewers Tips

{brewers_tips}

); }
